attributes.action: ask The Queen to dissolve Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If, like me, you are fed up with Members of Parliament abusing expense claims by claiming for Kit Kat Chunkys, Bathplugs and the like, please sign my petition.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
